glsa.title: JPEG library: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: The JPEG library is vulnerable to a Denial of Service.

background.p: The JPEG library is able to load, handle and manipulate images in the JPEG format.

description.p: Tavis Ormandy of the Gentoo Linux Auditing Team discovered that the vulnerable JPEG library ebuilds compile JPEG without the --maxmem feature which is not recommended.

impact.p: By enticing a user to load a specially crafted JPEG image file an attacker could cause a Denial of Service, due to memory exhaustion.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
